verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Ikaari riri ni Mwathani tukuria)
Ngoro citu igie
na hinya wa kuigana,
mathingithi maremwo
ni gucienyenyia,
Ikaari ii Mwathani uka gwakwa,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ikaari twatigiirwo ni Muhonokia,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Rituteithagie ithui agenda guku thi,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Ni ikaari riri murio kuruga uuki,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O giathi ni kiri murugirwo wakio,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Ikaari riri niwe ugithondekeirwo,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Githagathage ukiambiririe kuriria,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Uyu ti ugeni wa kuoyagirwo nguo,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Tiga no nguo ya ukonyoku wa muoyo,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Ikimenye ndugethirime mutino,
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Njoya na muthece ndioyagira
iria ingi, Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Wagitigwo na thutha ukagunwo ni ki?
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
Nduhiuhe Mwathani we no
agwetereire!
Ikaari ii reke ngwamukire.
